title: 鼻血が出るのも悪くない

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Did my nosebleed stop...?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ugh... Why do I keep running into walls so many times...?
...Can you hear... Tannhaus...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: --Huh?
Can you hear me... Matikanetannhauser... I'm speaking directly to your heart...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wha-wha-wha!? Wh-what is this!? Who are you!?
I am the Nosebleed God.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Nosebleed God!?

text_block_list.name: Nosebleed God
text_block_list.text: You have summoned me because the nosebleeds you've shed have filled a bucket.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That much!? But I have run into things a lot...

text_block_list.name: Nosebleed God
text_block_list.text: Congratulations.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Is that something to celebrate...?

text_block_list.name: Nosebleed God
text_block_list.text: Of course. Nosebleeds are proof that you've run full speed without fear of collisions.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ooh~, I see!! When you put it that way, nosebleeds might not be so bad!

text_block_list.name: Nosebleed God
text_block_list.text: Please continue running full speed from now on. I'm cheering for you.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes! I'll do my best! Heave, heave, hmph!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Huh? Was I asleep?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, it was a dream~. That's right, a Nosebleed God...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...But nosebleeds are proof of running full speed...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe, maybe I had a good dream!
From that day onward, Matikanetannhauser's running gained a sharper edge.
